summary: BRAKE PEDAL FADES AND GOES CLEAR DOWN TO FLOORBOARD WHILE STOPPED AT A STOP LIGHT OR STOP SIGN.  PROBLEM IS GETTING WORSE.  I HAVE TAKEN TO DEALER 5 TIMES AND LAST TIME THE SERVICE MANAGER TOLD ME THIS IS NORMAL.  HE SAID THAT SOME OTHERS (NOT ALL)DO THE SAME THING. MINE STARTED THIS AT ABOUT 28,000 MILES.  I CURRENTLY HAVE 35400 MILES ON VEHICLE. TS
